    • Ctrl-T Open fuzzy finder dialog

    In frame mode you can toggle the list naviation frame on the left side:

    • Ctrl-L Toggle list view

    You can focus a list in frame mode or toggle a tab in frameless mode:

    • Ctrl-C Class list
    • Ctrl-I Mixin list
    • Ctrl-F File list
    • Ctrl-M Method list
    • Ctrl-E Extras list

    You can focus and blur the search input:

    • Ctrl-S Focus search input
    • Esc Blur search input

    In frameless mode you can close the list tab:

    • Esc Close list tab

    Class: Relationship

    Defined in: lib/Relationship._coffee
    Inherits: PropertyContainer

    Overview

    The class corresponding to a Neo4j relationship.

    Property Summary

    (Node) start Readonly

    The node this relationship goes from.

    (Node) end Readonly

    The node this relationship goes to.

    (String) type Readonly

    This relationship's type.

    Properties inherited from PropertyContainer

    self, exists, id, data

    Instance Method Summary

    • - (void) save(_) Persist or update this relationship in the database.
    • - (void) index(index, key, value, _) Add this relationship to the given relationship index under the given property key and value.

    Inherited Method Summary

    Methods inherited from PropertyContainer

    #equals, #delete

    Instance Method Details

    - (void) save(_)

    TODO: We should "return" (via callback) this relationship after the save too, just like we do for the Node class.

    Persist or update this relationship in the database.

    Parameters:

    • callback (Function)

    - (void) index(index, key, value, _)

    Add this relationship to the given relationship index under the given
    property key and value.

    Parameters:

    • index (String) — The name of the index, e.g. 'likes'.
    • key (String) — The property key to index under, e.g. 'created'.
    • value (Object) — The property value to index under, e.g. 1346713658393.
    • callback (Function)
